LanguageData.AttemptRecruit.label: recruit
LanguageData.AttemptRecruit.description: Wardens will attempt to recruit the prisoner. If the prisoner still has resistance, wardens will speak to them to reduce it.
LanguageData.Execution.label: execute
LanguageData.Execution.description: A warden will execute the prisoner on the spot by cutting. This can affect the mood of other prisoners and colonists.
LanguageData.MaintainOnly.label: maintain only
LanguageData.MaintainOnly.description: Just feed the prisoner and provide for their basic needs, without attempting any other interaction.
LanguageData.ReduceResistance.label: reduce resistance only
LanguageData.ReduceResistance.description: If the prisoner still has resistance, wardens will speak to them to reduce it. No recruit attempts will be made.
LanguageData.Release.label: release
LanguageData.Release.description: A warden will release the prisoner.
